results.title: Fatty Liver and Autoimmune Hepatitis: Two Forms of Liver Involvement in Lipodystrophies.
results.text_hl: She progressed favorably under @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and immunosuppressive treatment.
